translations.text: Yas'aloonaka anil anfaali qulil anfaalu lillaahi war-Rasooli fattaqul laaha Wa-aslihoo zaata bainikum Wa-atee'ul laaha Wa-Rasoolahooo in kuntum mu'mineen

translations.text: innamal mu'minoonal lazeena izaa zukiral laahu wajilat quloobuhum Wa-izaa tuliyat alaihim Aayaatuhoo zaadat-hum eemaananw Wa-'alaa Rabbihim yatawakkaloon

translations.text: Ulaaa'ika humul mu'minoona haqqaa; lahum darajaatun inda Rabbihim Wa-magh-firatunw Wa-rizqun kareem

translations.text: Liyuhiqqal haqqa Wa-yubtilal baatila Wa-law karihal mujrimoon

translations.text: Zaalikum fazooqoohu Wa-anna lilkaafireena 'azaaban Naar

translations.text: Wa-law alimal laahu feehim khairal la-asma'ahum; Wa-law asma'ahum latawallaw Wa-hum mu'ridoon

translations.text: Yaaa-aiyuhal lazeena aamanus tajeeboo lillaahi Wa-lir-Rasooli izaa da'aakum limaa yuhyeekum wa'lamooo annal laaha yahoolu bainal mar'i Wa-qalbihee Wa-anahooo ilaihi tuhsharoon

words.en: O you||who||believe||(Do) not||betray||Allah||and the Messenger||or betray||your trusts||while you||know

translations.text: Yaaa-aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa takhoonal laaha war-Rasoola Wa-takhoonooo amaanaatikum Wa-antum ta'lamoon

translations.text: Yaaa-aiyuhal lazeena aamanooo in tattaqul laaha yaj'al lakum furqaananw Wa-yukaffir 'ankum saiyi-aatikum Wa-yaghfir lakum; wallaahu zul fadlil 'azeem

translations.text: Wa-iz yamkuru bikal lazeena kafaroo liyusbitooka aw yaqtulooka aw yukhrijook; Wa-yamkuroona Wa-yamkurul laahu wallaahu khairul maakireen

translations.text: Wa-izaa tutlaa alaihim Aayaatunaa qaaloo qad sami'naa law nashaaa'u laqulnaa misla haazaaa in haazaaa illaaa asaateerul awwaleen

translations.text: Wa-iz qaalul laahumma in kaana haazaa huwal haqqa min indika fa-amtir alainaa hijaaratam minas samaaa'i awi tinaa bi-'azaabin aleem

words.en: But not||is||(for) Allah||that He punishes them||while you||(are) among them||and not||is||Allah||the One Who punishes them||while they||seek forgiveness

translations.text: Wa-maa kaanal laahu liyu'az-zibahum Wa-anta feehim; Wa-maa kaanal laahu mu'az-zibahum Wa-hum yastaghfiroon

translations.text: Wa-maa lahum allaa yu'az-zibahumul laahu Wa-hum yasuddoona anil Masjidil Haraami Wa-maa kaanooo awliyaaa'ah; in awliyaaa'-uhooo illal muttaqoona Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

translations.text: Wa-maa kaana Salaatuhum indal Baiti illa mukaaa-anw wa-tasdiyah; fazooqul 'azaaba bimaa kuntum takfuroon

translations.text: innal lazeena kafaroo yunfiqoona amwaalahum liyasuddoo 'an sabeelil laah; fasayunfiqoonahaa summa takoonu alaihim hasratan summa yughlaboon; wal-lazeena kafarooo ilaa Jahannnama yuhsharoona

words.id: karena hendak memisahkan||Allah||yang buruk||dari||yang baik||dan Dia menjadikan||yang buruk||sebagiannya||atas||sebagian yang lain||maka/lalu Dia menumpukkannya||semuanya||maka Dia menjadikannya||dalam||neraka jahanam||mereka itulah||mereka||orang-orang yang merugi

translations.text: Liyameezal laahul khabeesa minat taiyibi Wa-yaj'alal khabeesa ba'dahoo 'ala ba'din fayarkumahoo jamee'an fayaj'alahoo fee Jahannnam; ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon

words.en: Say||to those who||disbelieve||if||they cease||will be forgiven||for them||what||[verily]||(is) past||But if||they return||then verily||preceded||(the) practice||(of) the former (people)

translations.text: Qul lillazeena kafarooo iny yantahoo yughfar lahum maa qad salafa Wa-iny ya'oodoo faqad madat sunnatul awwaleen

words.id: dan perangilah mereka||sehingga||tidak||ada lagi||fitnah||dan adalah||agama||semuanya||bagi Allah||maka jika||mereka berhenti||maka sesungguhnya||Allah||dengan /terhadap apa||mereka kerjakan||Maha Melihat
words.en: And fight them||until||not||there is||oppression||and is||the religion||all of it||for Allah||But if||they ceased||then indeed||Allah||of what||they do||(is) All-Seer

translations.text: Wa-qaatiloohum hattaa laa takoona fitnatunw Wa-yakoonad deenu kulluhoo lillaah; fainin tahaw fa-innal laaha bimaa ya'maloona Baseer

words.id: dan jika||mereka berpaling||maka ketahuilah||bahwasanya||Allah||Pelindungmu||sebaik-baik||Pelindung||dan sebaik-baik||Penolong
words.en: And if||they turn away||then know||that||Allah||(is) your Protector||Excellent||(is) the Protector||and Excellent||(is) the Helper

translations.text: Wa-in tawallaw fa'lamooo annal laaha mawlaakum; ni'mal mawlaa Wa-ni'man naseer

words.id: dan ketahuilah||sesungguhnya||kamu rampas||dari||sesuatu/apa saja||maka sesungguhnya||bagi/untuk Allah||seperlimanya||dan untuk Rasul||dan untuk yang dimiliki||kerabat dekat||dan anak-anak yatim||dan orang-orang miskin||dan Ibnu||Sabil||jika||kalian adalah||kamu beriman||kepada Allah||dan kepada apa||Kami turunkan||atas||hamba Kami||pada hari||Furqan (pemisah)||pada hari||pertemuan||dua pasukan||dan Allah||atas||segala||sesuatu||Maha Kuasa

translations.text: Wa'lamooo annamaa ghanimtum min sha'in fa-anna lillaahi khumusahoo Wa-lir-Rasooli Wa-lizil qurba walyataamaa walmasaakeeni wabnis sabeeli in kuntum aamantum billaahi Wa-maaa anzalnaa 'ala abdinaa yawmal Furqaani yawmal taqal jam'aan; wal-laahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

translations.text: iz antum bil'udwatid dunyaa Wa-hum bil'udwatil quswaa warrakbu asfala minkum; Wa-law tawaa'attum lakhtalaftum fil mee'aadi Wa-laakil liyaqdiyal laahu amran kaana maf'oolal liyahlika man halaka 'am baiyinatinw Wa-yahyaa man haiya 'am baiyinah; Wa-innal laaha la-Samee'un 'Aleem

words.id: ketika||menampakkan mereka kepadamu||Allah||di dalam||mimpimu||sedikit||dan sekiranya||(Allah) menampakkan mereka kepadamu||banyak||pasti kamu menjadi gentar||dan pasti kamu berbantah-bantahan||dalam||urusan||akan tetapi||Allah||telah menyelamatkan||sesungguhnya Dia||Maha Mengetahui||dengan segala isi||dada/hati

translations.text: iz yureekahumul laahu fee manaamika qaleela; Wa-law araakahum kaseeral lafashiltum Wa-latanaaza'tum fil amri Wa-laakinnal laaha sallam; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor

translations.text: Wa-iz yureekumoohum izil taqaitum feee a'yunikum qaleelanw Wa-yuqallilukum feee a'yunihim liyaqdiyal laahu amran kaana maf'oolaa; Wa-ilal laahi turja'ul umoor

words.id: wahai||orang-orang yang||beriman||apabila||kamu  bertemu||pasukan/golongan||maka berteguh hatilah kamu||dan ingatlah kamu||Allah||sebanyak-banyaknya||agar kalian||kamu beruntung
words.en: O you||who||believe||When||you meet||a force||then be firm||and remember||Allah||much||so that you may||(be) successful

translations.text: Yaaa-aiyuhal lazeena aamanooo izaa laqeetum fi'atan fasbutoo wazkurul laaha kaseeral la'allakum tuflihoon

words.id: dan taatlah kamu||Allah||dan RasulNya||dan janganlah||kamu berbantah-bantahan||maka kamu menjadi gentar||dan hilang||kekuatanmu||dan bersabarlah kamu||sesungguhnya||Allah||beserta||orang-orang yang sabar

translations.text: Wa-atee'ul laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo Wa-laa tanaaza'oo fatafshaloo Wa-tazhaba reehukum wasbiroo; innal laaha ma'as saabireen

words.en: And (do) not||be||like those who||came forth||from||their homes||boastfully||and showing off||(to) the people||and hinder (them)||from||(the) way||(of) Allah||And Allah||of what||they do||(is) All-Encompassing

translations.text: Wa-laa takoonoo kallazeena kharajoo min diyaarihim bataranw Wa-ri'aaa'an naasi Wa-yasuddoona 'an sabeelil laah; wallaahu bimaa ya'maloona muheet

words.id: dan ketika||menjadikan memandang baik||bagi/kepada mereka||syaitan||pekerjaan mereka||dan ia berkata||tidak ada||menang||bagi kalian||pada hari||dari||manusia||dan sesungguhnya saya||pelindung||bagi kalian||maka tatkala||saling melihat||kedua pasukan||ia berbalik||atas||tumitnya/kebelakang||dan ia berkata||sesungguhnya saya||berlepas diri||daripada kamu||sesungguhnya saya||saya melihat||apa||tidak||kamu lihat||sesungguhnya saya||saya takut||Allah||dan Allah||sangat keras||siksaan

translations.text: Wa-iz zaiyana lahumush shaitaanu a'maalahum Wa-qaala laa ghaaliba lakumul yawma minan naasi Wa-innee jaarul lakum falammaa taraaa'atil fi'ataani nakasa 'alaa aqibaihi Wa-qaala innee bareee'um minkum innee araa maa laa tarawna inneee akhaaful laah; wallaahu shadeedul iqaab

translations.text: iz yaqoolul munaafiqoona wallazeena fee quloobihim maradun gharra haaa'ulaaa'i deenuhum; Wa-mai yatawakkal 'alal laahi fa-innal laaha 'azee-zun Hakeem

words.en: And if||you (could) see||when||take away souls||(of) those who||disbelieve||the Angels||striking||their faces||and their backs||Taste||(the) punishment||(of) the Blazing Fire

translations.text: Wa-law taraaa iz yatawaf-fal lazeena kafarul malaaa'ikatu yadriboona wujoohahum Wa-adbaarahum Wa-zooqoo 'azaabal hareeq

words.en: That||(is) for what||sent forth||your hands||And indeed||Allah||(is) not||unjust||to His slaves

translations.text: Zaalika bimaa qaddamat aideekum Wa-anal laaha laisa bizallaamil lil-'abeed

words.id: serupa dengan keadaan||keluarga/pengikut||Fir'aun||dan orang-orang yang||dari||sebelum mereka||kafir/ingkar||dengan ayat-ayat||Allah||maka mengambil/menyiksa mereka||Allah||dengan dosa-dosa mereka||sesungguhnya||Allah||Maha Kuat||amat keras||siksaan

translations.text: Kadaabi Aali Fir'awna wal-lazeena min qablihim; kafaroo bi-Aayaatil laahi fa-akhazahu-mul laahu bizunoobihim; innal laaha qawiyyun shadeedul iqaab

words.id: demikian itu||dengan/karena sesungguhnya||Allah||tidak akan||ada||perubahan||suatu nikmat||Dia anugerahkannya||atas||kaum||sehingga||mereka merubah||apa yang||pada diri mereka sendiri||dan sesungguhnya||Allah||Maha Mendengar||Maha Mengetahui

translations.text: Zaalika bi-annal laaha lam yakumu ghaiyiran ni'matan an'amahaa 'alaa qawmin hattaa yughaiyiroo maa bianfusihim Wa-annal laaha samee'un 'Aleem

words.id: serupa dengan keadaan||keluarga/pengikut||Fir'aun||dan orang-orang yang||dari||sebelum mereka||mereka mendustakan||dengan ayat-ayat||Tuhan mereka||maka Kami binasakan mereka||dengan dosa-dosa mereka||dan Kami tenggelamkan||keluarga/pengikut||Fir'aun||dan semuanya||adalah mereka||orang-orang yang dzalim
words.en: Like (the) way||(of) people||(of) Firaun||and those who||(were) from||before them||They denied||(the) Signs||(of) their Lord||so We destroyed them||for their sins||and We drowned||(the) people||(of) Firaun||and (they) all||were||wrongdoers

translations.text: Kadaabi Aali Fir'awna wallazeena min qablihim; kazzaboo bi-Aayaati Rabbihim faahlaknaahum bizunoobihim Wa-aghraqnaa Aala Fir'awn; Wa-kullun kaanoo zaalimeen

words.id: sesungguhnya||seburuk-buruk||binatang melata||di sisi||Allah||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||maka mereka||tidak||beriman
words.en: Indeed||(the) worst||(of) the living creatures||near||Allah||(are) those who||disbelieve||and they||(will) not||believe

translations.text: inna sharrad dawaaabbi indal laahil lazeena kafaroo fahum laa yu'minoon

words.id: orang-orang yang||kamu telah mengambil perjanjian||dari mereka||kemudian||mereka merusak/mengkhianati||janji mereka||pada||setiap||kali||dan mereka||tidak||takut
words.en: Those who||you made a covenant||with them||then||they break||their covenant||[in]||every||time||and they||(do) not||fear (Allah)

translations.text: Allazeena 'aahatta min-hum summa yanqudoona 'ahdahum fee kulli marratinw Wa-hum laa yattaqoon

words.id: maka jika||kamu menemui mereka||dalam||peperangan||maka cerai-beraikanlah||dengan mereka||orang||dibelakang mereka||supaya mereka||mereka mengambil pelajaran
words.en: So if||you gain dominance over them||in||the war||disperse||by them||(those) who||(are) behind them||so that they may||take heed

translations.text: Fa-immaa tasqafannahum fil harbi fasharrid bihim man khalfahum la'allahum yazzakkaroon

words.id: dan jika||kamu sungguh takut||dari||kaum/golongan||pengkhianatan||maka lemparkan/kembalikan||kepada mereka||atas||yang sama jujur||sesungguhnya||Allah||tidak||menyukai||orang-orang yang berkhianat
words.en: And if||you fear||from||a people||betrayal||throw back||to them||on||equal (terms)||Indeed||Allah||(does) not||love||the traitors

translations.text: Wa-immaa takhaafana min qawmin khiyaanatan fambiz ilaihim 'alaa sawaaa'; innal laaha laa yuhibbul khaaa'ineen

words.id: dan janganlah||mengira||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||mereka terlepas/lolos||sesungguhnya mereka||tidak||dapat melemahkan
words.en: And (let) not||think||those who||disbelieve||they can outstrip||Indeed they||(can) not||escape

translations.text: Wa-laa yahsabannal lazeena kafaroo sabaqooo; innahum laa yu'jizoon

words.id: dan siapkanlah||untuk mereka||apa||kamu sanggupi||dari||kekuatan||dan dari||ditambat||kuda||kamu menakutkan/menggetarkan||dengannya||musuh||Allah||dan musuh kalian||dan orang-orang lain||dari||selain mereka||tidak||kamu mereka||Allah||mengetahui mereka||dan apa yang||kamu nafkahkan||dari||sesuatu||di||jalan||Allah||dicukupkan||kepadamu||dan kalian||tidak||dianiaya
words.en: And prepare||for them||whatever||you able (to)||of||force||and of||tethered||horses||(to) terrify||therewith||(the) enemy||(the) enemy||and your enemy||and others||from||besides them||not||(do) you know them||(but) Allah||knows them||And whatever||you spend||from||(any) thing||in||(the) way||(of) Allah||it will be fully repaid||to you||and you||(will) not||be wronged

translations.text: Wa-a'iddoo lahum mas tata'tum min quwwatinw Wa-mir ribaatil khaili turhiboona bihee 'aduwwal laahi Wa-'aduwwakum Wa-aakhareena min doonihim laa ta'lamoo-nahum Allaahu ya'lamuhum; Wa-maa tunfiqoo min shai'in fee sabeelil laahi yuwaffa ilaikum Wa-antum laa tuzlamoon

words.id: dan jika||mereka condong||untuk/kepada perdamaian||maka hendaklah kamu condong||kepadanya||dan bertawakkallah||atas/kepada||Allah||sesunguhnya Dia||Dia||Maha Mendengar||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: And if||they incline||to peace||then you (also) incline||to it||and put (your) trust||in||Allah||Indeed||He||(is) All-Hearer||All-Knower

translations.text: Wa-in janahoo lissalmi fajnah lahaa Wa-tawakkal 'alal laah; innahoo Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem

words.id: dan jika||mereka bermaksud||akan||menipu kamu||maka sesungguhnya||cukuplah bagimu||Allah||Dia||yang||memperkuat kamu||dengan pertolonganNya||dan dengan orang-orang yang beriman
words.en: But if||they intend||to||deceive you||then indeed||is sufficient for you||Allah||He||(is) the One Who||supported you||with His help||and with the believers

translations.text: Wa-iny yureedooo any yakhda'ooka fainna hasbakal laah; Huwal lazeee aiyadaka binasrihee Wa-bilmu'mineen

words.id: dan Dia menjinakkan/mempersatukan||antara||hati mereka||walaupun||kamu membelanjakan||apa||di dalam||bumi||semuanya||tidak dapat||kamu menjinakkan/mempersatukan||antara||hati mereka||akan tetapi||Allah||menjinakkan/mempersatukan||diantara mereka||sesungguhnya Dia||Maha Perkasa||Maha Bijaksana
words.en: And He (has) put affection||between||their hearts||If||you (had) spent||whatever||(is) in||the earth||all||not||(could) you (have) put affection||between||their hearts||but||Allah||(has) put affection||between them||Indeed, He||(is) All-Mighty||All-Wise

translations.text: Wa-allafa baina quloobihim; law anfaqta maa fil ardi jamee'am maaa allafta baina quloobihim Wa-laakinnal laaha allafa bainahum; innaahoo 'Azeezun Hakeem

words.id: wahai||Nabi||cukuplah bagimu||Allah||dan orang||mengikuti kamu||dari||orang-orang mukmin/beriman
words.en: O||Prophet||Sufficient for you||(is) Allah||and whoever||follows you||of||the believers

translations.text: Yaaa-aiyuhan Nabiyyu hasbukal laahu Wa-manit taba'aka minal mu'mineen

words.id: wahai||Nabi||kobarkanlah semangat||orang-orang mukmin/beriman||atas/untuk||berperang||jika||ada||diantara kamu||duapuluh||orang-orang yang sabar||mereka mengalahkan||duaratus||dan jika||ada||diantara kamu||seratus||mereka mengalahkan||seribu||dari pada||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||dengan/disebabkan bahwasanya||kaum||tidak||mengerti

translations.text: Yaaa-aiyuhan Nabiyyu harridil mu'mineena 'alal qitaal; iny yakum minkum ishroona saabiroona yaghliboo mi'atayn; Wa-iny yakum minkum mi'atuny yaghlibooo alfam minal lazeena kafaroo bi-anahum qawmul laa yafqahoon

words.id: sekarang||telah meringankan||Allah||dari kalian||dan Dia telah mengetahui||bahwasanya||padamu||kelemahan||maka jika||ada||diantara kamu||seratus||orang yang sabar||mereka mengalahkan||duaratus||dan jika||ada||diantara kamu||seribu||mereka mengalahkan||duaribu||dengan izin||Allah||dan Allah||beserta||orang-orang yang sabar
words.en: Now||has (been) lightened||(by) Allah||for you||and He knows||that||in you||(there) is weakness||So if||(there) are||among you||a hundred||steadfast||they will overcome||two hundred||And if||(there) are||among you||a thousand||they will overcome||two thousand||with (the) permission||(of) Allah||And Allah||(is) with||the steadfast

translations.text: Al'aana khaffafal laahu 'ankum Wa-'alima anna feekum da'faa; fa-iny yakum minkum mi'atun saabiratuny yaghliboo mi'atayn; Wa-iny yakum minkum alfuny yaghlibooo alfaini bi-iznil laah; wallaahu ma'as saabireen

words.id: tidak||ada||bagi seorang Nabi||bahwa||dia adalah||baginya||tawanan||sehingga||ia memecah belah/melumpuhkan||di||bumi||kamu menghendaki||harta benda||duniawi||dan Allah||menghendaki||akhirat||dan Allah||Maha Perkasa||Maha Bijaksana
words.en: Not||is||for a Prophet||that||(there) should be||for him||prisoners of war||until||he has battled strenuously||in||the land||You desire||(the) commodities||(of) the world||but Allah||desires||(for you) the Hereafter||And Allah||(is) All-Mighty||All-Wise

translations.text: Maa kaana li-Nabiyyin ai yakoona lahooo asraa hatta yuskhina fil ard; tureedoona aradad dunyaa wallaahu yureedul Aakhirah; wallaahu 'Azeezun Hakeem

words.id: kalau sekiranya tidak ada||ketetapan||dari||Allah||terdahulu||niscaya menimpa kamu||dalam/disebabkan apa||kamu telah mengambil||siksaan||besar
words.en: Had not||an ordainment||from||Allah||preceded||surely (would) have touched you||for what||you took||a punishment||great

translations.text: Law-laa Kitaabum minal laahi sabaqa lamassakum fee-maaa akhaztum 'azaabun 'azeem

words.id: maka makanlah||dari apa/sebagian||kamu telah mengambil rampasan perang||halal||yang baik||dan bertakwalah||Allah||sesungguhnya||Allah||Maha Pengampun||Maha Penyayang
words.en: So eat||from what||you got as war booty||lawful||(and) good||and fear||Allah||Indeed||Allah||(is) Oft-Forgiving||Most Merciful

translations.text: Fakuloo mimmaa ghanimtum halaalan taiyibaa; watta qullaah; innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem

words.id: wahai||Nabi||katakanlah||kepada orang||dalam||tanganmu||dari||tawanan||jika||mengetahui||Allah||dalam||hati kamu||kebaikan||Dia akan memberikan kepadamu||kebaikan/lebih baik||dari apa||telah diambil||dari kamu||dan Dia akan mengampuni||bagi kalian||dan Allah||Maha Pengampun||Maha Penyayang
words.en: O||Prophet||Say||to whoever||(is) in||your hands||of||the captives||If||knows||Allah||in||your hearts||any good||He will give you||better||than what||was taken||from you||and He will forgive||you||And Allah||(is) Oft-Forgiving||Most Merciful

translations.text: Yaaa-aiyuhan Nabiyyu qul liman feee aideekum minal asraaa iny ya'lamil laahu fee quloobikum khairany yu'tikum khayram mimmaaa ukhiza minkum Wa-yaghfir lakum; wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem

words.id: jika||mereka menghendaki||berkhianat kepadamu||maka sesungguhnya||mereka berkhianat||Allah||dari||sebelum||maka/lalu Dia memungkinkan/menjadikan||dari/terhadap mereka||dan Allah||Maha Mengetahui||Maha Bijaksana
words.en: But if||they intend||(to) betray you||certainly||they have betrayed||Allah||from||before||So He gave (you) power||over them||And Allah||(is) All-Knower||All-Wise

translations.text: Wa-iny yureedoo khiyaa-nataka faqad khaanul laaha min qablu fa-amkana minhum; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem

words.id: sesungguhnya||orang-orang yang||beriman||dan mereka berhijrah||dan mereka berjihad||dengan harta mereka||dan jiwa mereka||di/pada||jalan||Allah||dan orang-orang yang||memberikan perlindungan||dan mereka memberi pertolongan||mereka itulah||sebagian mereka||menjadi pelindung||sebagian yang lain||dan orang-orang yang||beriman||dan tidak/belum||mereka berhijrah||tidak ada||bagi kalian||dari||memberi pertolongan mereka||dari||sesuatu||sehingga||mereka berhijrah||dan jika||mereka minta pertolongan padamu||dalam||agama||maka wajib atasmu||memberi pertolongan||kecuali||atas||kaum||antara kamu||dan antara  mereka||perjanjian||dan Allah||dengan/kepada apa||kamu kerjakan||Maha Melihat
words.en: Indeed||those who||believed||and emigrated||and strove hard||with their wealth||and their lives||in||(the) way||(of) Allah||and those who||gave shelter||and helped||those||some of them||(are) allies||(of) another||But those who||believed||and (did) not||emigrate||(it is) not||for you||(of)||their protection||(in)||(in) anything||until||they emigrate||And if||they seek your help||in||the religion||then upon you||(is to) help them||except||against||a people||between you||and between them||(is) a treaty||And Allah||of what||you do||(is) All-Seer

translations.text: innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-haajaroo Wa-jaahadoo bi-amwaalihim Wa-anfusihim fee sabeelil laahi wallazeena aawaw Wa-nasarooo ulaaa'ika ba'duhum awliyaaa'u ba'd; wallazeena aamanoo Wa-lam yuhaajiroo maa lakum minw walaayatihim min shai'in hatta yuhaajiroo; Wa-inis tansarookum fid deeni fa'alaiku munnasru illaa 'alaa qawmin bainakum Wa-bainahum meesaaq; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseer

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||sebagian mereka||menjadi pelindung||sebagian yang lain||kecuali||kamu melaksanakannya||adalah/terjadi||fitnah||di||bumi||dan kerusakan||yang besar
words.en: And those who||disbelieve||some of them||(are) allies||(to) another||If not||you do it||(there) will be||oppression||in||the earth||and corruption||great

translations.text: Wallazeena kafaroo ba'duhum awliyaaa'u ba'd; illaa taf'aloohu takun fitnatun fil ardi Wa-fasaadun kabeer

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||beriman||dan mereka berhijrah||dan mereka berjihad||pada||jalan||Allah||dan orang-orang yang||memberi tempat kediaman/perlindungan||dan mereka memberi pertolongan||mereka itulah||mereka||orang-orang yang beriman||benar||bagi mereka||ampunan||dan rezki||yang mulia
words.en: And those who||believed||and emigrated||and strove hard||in||(the) way||(of) Allah||and those who||gave shelter||and helped||those||they (are)||the believers||(in) truth||For them||(is) forgiveness||and a provision||noble

translations.text: Wallazeena aamanoo Wa-haajaroo Wa-jaahadoo fee sabeelil laahi wallazeena aawaw Wa-nasarooo ulaaa'ika humul mu'minoona haqqaa; lahum maghfiratunw Wa-rizqun kareem

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||beriman||dari||sesudah itu||dan mereka berhijrah||dan mereka berjihad||bersamamu||maka mereka itu||dari kamu||dan orang mempunyai||hubungan kerabat||sebagian mereka||lebih utama||dengan sebagian yang lain||di dalam||Kitab||Allah||sesungguhnya||Allah||dengan segala||sesuatu||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: And those who||believed||from||afterwards||and emigrated||and strove hard||with you||then those||(are) of you||But those||(of) blood relationship||some of them||(are) nearer||to another||in||(the) Book||(of) Allah||Indeed||Allah||of every||thing||(is) All-Knower

translations.text: Wallazeena aamanoo min ba'du Wa-haajaroo Wa-jaahadoo ma'akum fa-Ulaaa'ika minkum; Wa-ulul arhaami baduhum awlaa biba'din fee Kitaabil laah; innal laaha bikulli shai'in 'Aleem
